snippet: Sidney A. Ribeau recently extended his term through spring 2015, but Howard’s academic deans had charged that the university was plagued by fiscal mismanagement.
abstract: Sidney A Ribeau, president of Howard University, announces he will resign at the end of 2013; resignation comes after months of internal rifts, but is still surprising in light of the fact that Ribeau signed a contract over the summer that extended his term through the spring of 2015.
lead_paragraph: Sidney A. Ribeau recently extended his term through spring 2015, but Howard’s academic deans had charged that the university was plagued by fiscal mismanagement.

headline.main: In Surprise Move, President of Howard University Resigns as Budget Troubles Loom
headline.print_headline: In Surprise Move, President of Howard University Resigns as Budget Troubles Loom
